articles.author: Zac Bowden
articles.title: Microsoft will let users uninstall Edge, Bing, and disable ads on Windows 11 as it complies with the Digital Markets Act - Windows Central
articles.description: Microsoft ensures Windows 11 is compliant with the Digital Markets Act in the European Economic Area.
articles.content:
What you need to know
  • Microsoft has published a blog post detailing how it's making Windows 11 compliant with the Digital Markets Act (DMA) in the European Economic Area (EEA.)
